title: How to Fix a Frozen Xbox 360

steps.title: Turn on your Xbox.
steps.content: Turn on your Xbox. Use the 'power' button.

steps.title: Go to your Xbox memory.
steps.content: Go to your Xbox memory. Use the controller.

steps.title: Highlight your hard drive and press Y.
steps.content: Highlight your hard drive and press Y. Do not enter it yet.

steps.title: Press Y click into clear system cache.
steps.content: Press Y click into clear system cache. Continue to clear it.

steps.title: Try to recreate the problem.
steps.content: Try to recreate the problem. If it doesn't freeze it's fixed.

steps.title: Shut down your Xbox and take the hard drive out, if it freezes again.
steps.content: Shut down your Xbox and take the hard drive out, if it freezes again. Again use the 'power' button.

steps.title: Repeat step five.
steps.content: Repeat step five. If you can't recreate problem, then it is solved.

steps.title: Go to the website and have it fixed by following the steps.
steps.content: Go to the website and have it fixed by following the steps. Use the points below to check if it is a hard drive or console problem. If it does freeze your Xbox needs to be sent in to be fixed. if it doesn't freeze your hard drive needs to be sent in to be repaired.
